resources.string:
Please read the about page carefully!
 V1.3.3
 [+] Change the text of Detection Test, for emojis not showing on some devices
 [+] Remove Exclude Self button, since if not check, the target apps are sure to crash
 [+] Now all template changes take effect in real time
 [+] Change logging
 V1.3.2
 [+] Performance optimization
 Known bugs
Under Edxposed YAHFA file detection hide does not work. (test version: 4683), please switch to Sandhook or LSPosed instead.
